<!-- Loading libraries -->


install.packages("corrplot")
install.packages("randomForest")

library(survival)
library(tidyverse)
library(caret)
library(randomForest)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(corrplot)
library(readxl)
library(tidyr)
library(survminer)
library(sf)
library(tmap)


<!-- Load the dataset -->

df <- read_excel("D:/Downloads/data with variable names(4).xlsx", col_types = "text")

str(df)

<!-- Convert appropriate columns to appropriate data type -->

<!--Categorical variables-->

df$subcounty <- factor(df$subcounty)
df$maritalstatus <- factor(df$maritalstatus)
df$residence <- factor(df$residence)
df$employmentstatus <- factor(df$employmentstatus)
df$ancattendance <- factor(df$ancattendance)
df$facilitylevelanc <- factor(df$facilitylevelanc)
df$hivstatusbeforepregnancy <- factor(df$hivstatusbeforepregnancy)
df$syphillis <- factor(df$syphillis)
df$uti <- factor(df$uti)
df$miscarriage <- factor(df$miscarriage)
df$abortion <- factor(df$abortion)
df$stillbirth <- factor(df$stillbirth)
df$premature <- factor(df$premature)
df$haartduringpregnancy <- factor(df$haartduringpregnancy)
df$historyofstiduringpregnancy <- factor(df$historyofstiduringpregnancy)
df$genitalwart <- factor(df$genitalwart)
df$vaginaldischargesyndrome <- factor(df$vaginaldischargesyndrome)
df$genitalherpes <- factor(df$genitalherpes)
df$treatedduringpregnancy <- factor(df$treatedduringpregnancy)
df$malaria <- factor(df$malaria)
df$anaemia <- factor(df$anaemia)
df$hypertention <- factor(df$hypertention)
df$patnershivstatus <- factor(df$patnershivstatus)
df$whohivdiseasestage <- factor(df$whohivdiseasestage)
df$sexofthebaby <- factor(df$sexofthebaby)
df$birthpcr <- factor(df$birthpcr)
df$weekspcr <- factor(df$weekspcr)
df$monthspcr <- factor(df$monthspcr)
df$yearpcr <- factor(df$yearpcr)
df$monthsantibodytest <- factor(df$monthsantibodytest)
df$educationlevel <- factor(df$educationlevel, 
                             levels = c("never attended school", "primary", "secondary", "tertiary"))
df$adherence <- factor(df$adherence, 
                       levels = c("poor", "fair", "good"))

<!--Numeric variables-->

df$age <- as.numeric(df$age)
df$weightkg <- as.numeric(df$weightkg)
df$bwtkgs <- as.numeric(df$bwtkgs)
df$gestationatfirstancwks <- as.numeric(df$gestationatfirstancwks)
df$babywt6wks <- as.numeric(df$babywt6wks)
df$cd4cellcountcellsmm3 <- factor(df$cd4cellcountcellsmm3, 
                                  levels = c("below 200", "200-500", "above 500"))
df$numberofchildren <- as.numeric(df$numberofchildren)
df$numberofancvisitsmade <- as.numeric(df$numberofancvisitsmade)
df$hemoglobinlevelduringpregnancy <- as.numeric(df$hemoglobinlevelduringpregnancy)
df$time <- as.numeric(df$time)
df$lduration <- gsub("over 15", "16", df$lduration)  # Handle "over 15" case
df$durationofbfmonths <- as.numeric(df$durationofbfmonths)
df$var51 <- as.numeric(df$var51)
df$var52 <- as.numeric(df$var52)

str(df)


<!--Rename coordinate columns for clarity-->

df <- df %>%
  rename(latitude = var52, longitude = var51)


<!--Summary of the dataset to verify changes-->

summary(df)

<!--Data Exploration-->

duplicates <- df[duplicated(df),]

print(duplicates)

<!--No duplicates-->

missing_per_column <- colSums(is.na(df))
total_missing <- sum(missing_per_column)
print(total_missing)
print(missing_per_column)

columns_with_missing <- names(missing_per_column[missing_per_column > 0])
print(columns_with_missing)

<!--Compute summary statistics for numeric columns-->

summary_stats <- df %>%
  select(where(is.numeric)) %>%
  summarise(across(everything(), list(
    min = ~min(., na.rm = TRUE),
    Q1 = ~quantile(., 0.25, na.rm = TRUE),
    median = ~median(., na.rm = TRUE),
    mean = ~mean(., na.rm = TRUE),
    Q3 = ~quantile(., 0.75, na.rm = TRUE),
    max = ~max(., na.rm = TRUE),
    sd = ~sd(., na.rm = TRUE)
  )))

summary(summary_stats)

<!--Visualize distributions with histograms-->

numeric_cols <- df %>% select(where(is.numeric)) %>% colnames()
numeric_cols <- setdiff(numeric_cols, c("longitude", "latitude"))

for (col in numeric_cols) {
  p <- ggplot(df, aes_string(x = col)) +
    geom_histogram(binwidth = 30, fill = "blue", alpha = 0.7) +
    ggtitle(paste("Histogram of", col)) +
    theme_minimal()
  print(p)
}

png('histogram.png')
dev.off()

<!--Boxplot-->

for (col in numeric_cols) {
  p <- ggplot(df, aes(y = .data[[col]])) +  # Fix aes_string() issue
    geom_boxplot(fill = "lightblue", na.rm = TRUE) +  # Handle NAs
    ggtitle(paste("Boxplot of", col)) +
    theme_minimal()
  print(p)
}

df_clean <- df %>%
  drop_na(time, hivstatusbeforepregnancy)

<!--Create survival object-->

surv_obj <- Surv(time = df_clean$time, event = df_clean$hivstatusbeforepregnancy)

<!--Fit Kaplan-Meier survival model-->

km_fit <- survfit(surv_obj ~ 1, data = df_clean)

<!--Plot Kaplan-Meier curve-->

ggsurvplot(km_fit, data = df_clean, conf.int = TRUE,
           ggtheme = theme_minimal(),
           title = "Kaplan-Meier Survival Curve",
           xlab = "Time (Months)", ylab = "HIV-Free Survival Probability")


df_sf <- st_as_sf(df, coords = c("longitude", "latitude"), crs = 4326)

County <- st_read("D:/Downloads/County_shapefile/County.shp")
View(County)


kenya_shp <- st_read("C:/Users/pc/Desktop/Counties Shape File/County.shp")
homabay_shp <- kenya_shp %>% filter(COUNTY == "Homa Bay")
homabay_shp

homabay_data <- st_join(homabay_shp, df_sf)


df_sf <- df_sf %>% mutate(HIV_positive = ifelse(syphillis == "positive", 1, 0))

colnames(homabay_shp)
colnames(hiv_counts)


hiv_counts <- df_sf %>%
  group_by(subcounty) %>%
  summarize(total_cases = sum(HIV_positive, na.rm = TRUE))

hiv_counts <- st_drop_geometry(hiv_counts)

homabay_shp <- homabay_shp %>%
  left_join(hiv_counts, by = "subcounty")




ggplot() +
  geom_sf(data = homabay_shp, fill = "lightblue", color = "black") +
  geom_sf(data = df_sf, aes(color = patient_density), size = 2) +
  scale_color_viridis_c(name = "Patient Density") +
  labs(title = "Study Area: Homa Bay County", x = "Longitude", y = "Latitude") +
  theme_minimal()
